histogram.name: MachineLearningService.CpuTimeMicrosec
histogram.summary: CPU time (for one CPU core) of one Chrome OS ML Service request. Reported for all users; users without high-resolution clocks will report 0 for short requests.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.CpuUsageMilliPercent
histogram.summary: Fraction of total CPU resources used by Chrome OS ML Service, sampled every 5 minutes.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.CreateGraphExecutorResult.Event
histogram.summary: The result of CreateGraphExecutor, which can be OK or some specific error.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.DocumentScanner.{RequestName}.Event
histogram.summary: The result of DocumentScanner.{RequestName} request, which can be OK or ERROR.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.ExecuteResult.Event
histogram.summary: The result of Execute, which can be OK or some specific error.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.GrammarChecker.Check.Event
histogram.summary: The result of grammar check, which can be OK or ERROR.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.GrammarChecker.LoadModelResult.Event
histogram.summary: The result of load grammar model, which can be OK or some specific error. The error code could be logged in machine learning service in chrome or in chromeos when grammar model is not loaded successfully.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.HandwritingModel.LoadModelResult.Event
histogram.summary: The result of load handwriting model, which can be OK or some specific error. The error code could be logged in machine learning service in chrome or in chromeos when handwriting model is not loaded successfully.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.HandwritingModel.Recognize.Event
histogram.summary: The result of handwriting recognition, which can be OK or some specific error.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.LoadModelResult
histogram.summary: The error result of LoadModel in cases when the model name could not be determined. See MachineLearningService.*.LoadModelResult.Event for the result broken down by model name when the name is known.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.LoadModelResult.Event
histogram.summary: The result of LoadModel, which can be OK or some specific error.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.MojoConnectionEvent
histogram.summary: Events related to the connection and disconnection of the Mojo IPC channel between Chrome and the Chrome OS ML Service.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.NumWorkerProcess
histogram.summary: Number of worker processes registered in ml-service. Only used in Chrome OS. Sampled every 5 minutes.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.PeakTotalMemoryKb
histogram.summary: Peak total (shared and non-shared) memory used by Chrome OS ML Service over the last 24 hours. Sampled every 5 minutes, so may miss short-lived spikes.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.ProcessError
histogram.summary: Process handling errors of ml-service. Emitted when there is error in process handling. For example, "failed to spawning worker process" etc. Only used in Chrome OS.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.ReapWorkerProcessErrno
histogram.summary: The "errno" of waitpid calls used by ml-service's control process to reap the worker processes. This is only recorded when waitpid meets error and should be rare. This is a Chrome OS only metric. And we only record the corresponding enum values of "ECHILD", "EINTR" and "EINVAL" because according to the man page of waitpid, they are the only possible errno. All the other "errno" are treated as "unknown" error.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.TextSuggester.Suggest.Event
histogram.summary: The result of a text suggester request, which can be OK or ERROR.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.TotalMemoryDeltaKb
histogram.summary: Memory usage increase caused by one Chrome OS ML Service request.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.TotalMemoryKb
histogram.summary: Total (shared and non-shared) memory used by Chrome OS ML Service, sampled every 5 minutes.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.WebPlatformHandwritingModel.GetPrediction.Event
histogram.summary: The result of Web platform handwriting recognition, which can be either OK or Error.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.WebPlatformHandwritingModel.LoadModelResult.Event
histogram.summary: The result of load web platform handwriting model, which can be OK or some specific error. The error code could be logged in machine learning service in chrome or in chromeos when handwriting model is not loaded successfully.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.WebPlatformTfLiteFlatBufferModel.Compute.Event
histogram.summary: The result of compute/inference based on a web platform model loaded, which can be OK or some specific error. The error code could be logged in machine learning service in chromeos when the computation fails.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.WebPlatformTfLiteFlatBufferModel.CreateModelLoaderResult.Event
histogram.summary: The result of creating web platform model loader, which can be success or some specific error. The error code could be logged in machine learning service in chromeos when the model loader can not be created successfully.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.WebPlatformTfLiteFlatBufferModel.Load.Event
histogram.summary: The result of loading a web platform model, which can be OK or some specific error. The error code could be logged in machine learning service in chromeos when model can not successfully loaded.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.WorkerProcessAcceptMojoConnectionTime
histogram.summary: The wall time used for the worker process to accept the mojo connection to control process in ml-service. Only used in Chrome OS.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.WorkerProcessCleanUpTime
histogram.summary: The wall time used by the control process to reap and cleanup the worker processes in ml-service. Only used in Chrome OS.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.WorkerProcessExitStatus
histogram.summary: The exit status of the worker processes of ml-service. Only used in Chrome OS. This is only emitted when the worker process exits with non-zero status. And theoretically, there can be 255 different types of status (from 1 to 255).

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.{ObsoleteRequestName}.CreateGraphExecutorResult.Event
histogram.summary: The result of obsolete {ObsoleteRequestName} CreateGraphExecutor request.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.{ObsoleteRequestName}.ExecuteResult.Event
histogram.summary: The result of obsolete {ObsoleteRequestName} Execute request.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.{ObsoleteRequestName}.LoadModelResult.Event
histogram.summary: The result of obsolete {ObsoleteRequestName} LoadModel request.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.{ObsoleteRequestName}.PrivateMemoryDeltaKb
histogram.summary: Deprecated 07/2019, because we change to record total (shared+unshared) memory rather than only private memory. Replaced by MachineLearningService.{ObsoleteRequestName}.TotalMemoryDeltaKb.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.{ObsoleteRequestName}.TotalMemoryDeltaKb
histogram.summary: Memory usage increase caused by obsolete {ObsoleteRequestName} request.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.{RequestName}.CpuTimeMicrosec
histogram.summary: CPU time (for one CPU core) of {RequestName} request. Reported for all users; users without high-resolution clocks will report 0 for short requests.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.{RequestName}.CreateGraphExecutorResult.Event
histogram.summary: The result of {RequestName} CreateGraphExecutor request, which can be OK or some specific error.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.{RequestName}.ExecuteResult.Event
histogram.summary: The result of {RequestName} Execute request, which can be OK or some specific error.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.{RequestName}.LoadModelResult.Event
histogram.summary: The result of {RequestName} LoadModel request, which can be OK or some specific error.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.{RequestName}.TotalMemoryDeltaKb
histogram.summary: Memory usage increase caused by {RequestName} request.
